estSalesTooltip.message: Estimated Monthly Sales is the estimated amount of sales of the product in one month. We calculate this value based on category and product rank.

rprTooltip.message: Monthly Revenue per Review is calculated as estimated revenue divided by count of reviews.

availableFromTooltip.message: Date First Available is the date when the product became available at Amazon

faq_q_0.message: Q: Is the cost for the extension a one time fee or is it monthly?

faq_a_0.message: A: The cost is one time fee. You don't need to pay for anything else. All the features of the extension are included.

faq_q_1.message: Q: I've bought the extension, how to use it?

faq_a_1.message: A: Open the Amazon web site, search for some products, hit the extension button. You'll see popup with a loader. After few seconds there will appear information about found products.

faq_q_2.message: Q: Are estimated values monthly, daily or yearly?

faq_q_3.message: Q: How the estimated values computes?

faq_a_3.message: A: These values are computing using formula based on Amazon top level category (f.e. Home & Garden, Books) and rank in one of these categories.

faq_q_4.message: Q: What does the Net column mean?

faq_a_4.message: A: Net column means price after FBA Fee subtraction and 15% subtraction of Amazon Referral Fee. If FBA Fee unavailable, net price computes by formula.

faq_q_5.message: Q: What does the LQS column mean?

faq_a_5.message: A: LQS is Listing Quality Score. AMZScout analizes many product description criteria and computes score for it. Higher score means higher position in search results. To see details point cursor on LQS value.

faq_q_6.message: Q: What does the RPR column mean?

faq_a_6.message: A: RPR is revenue per review. Greater RPR means better selling opportunities on Amazon.

faq_q_7.message: Q: Is FBA Fee computing for piece or for volume?

faq_a_7.message: A: FBA Fee is computing for piece with storage fee included for 1 month. It's computing based on shipping size and shipping weight taken from product page.

faq_q_8.message: Q: If I have another question or problem with the AMZScout, how I can get support?

faq_a_8.message: A: The fastest way to get support is writing your question to amazondevcrew@gmail.com

trialMessage.message:
For the next 7 days, you can use all the features of AMZScout Chrome Extension without any restrictions.

No credit card required. No surprises. Just results.

Here is some tips about AMZScout:
- Almost all table headers have useful tooltips. Hold the mouse on it a while and you'll see it.
- You can sort data by any column, just click on the table header.
- All values from the table with blue color are clickable, try to click them to see more oppotrunities.

Have a good scouting with AMZScout!

strictFilterTooltip.message: The filter parameters are too strict. Try to change them or turn off the filter.

t0.message:
Try to use AMZScout Pro at Stream or at Goldbox pages. There is tons of ideas for you! AMZScout Pro works almost with any Amazon pages.
Also we carefully will extract for you products from Movers and Shakers page and even from Most Wished For.

t1.message:
All the blue numbers and rows in the product spreadsheet are clickable.
Try to click them to check what each value means.

t2.message:
Titles of columns have pop-out hints, hover your cursor over a title for couple of seconds to see it.
You can click on any title and sort data in the spreadsheet by this indicator.
BTW, if you want to sort products by number appeared at page, click # sign at first column header.

t3.message: Add potential products to the favorites by clicking star on the left and check them whenever you want by clicking Favorites button at the bottom

t4.message: If you click on a value in FBA Fees or Net Price column, you will open Profit Calculator, that lets you enter the product cost to calculate profit and ROI.

t5.message: If you click a value in Rank column, you will see a graph of rank changes in time.

t6.message: If you move your cursor on 3 vertical dots on the right, you will open a drop-down menu, that allows you to find a similar products on Alibaba, copy product's ASIN or get product keywords.

t7.message: Find keyword ideas to promote your product effectively just by clicking 3 vertical dots on the right and choosing the needed action.

t8.message: Track any product in AMZScout Product Tracker by clicking "+" button next to the product number in the list.

t9.message:
The product is best selling with rank 1 if it has an orange round sign in BSR column.
Find out in which category the product is selling best hovering the cursor over the sign.

t10.message:
The EBC column shows green check mark when the product has Enhanced Brand Content or A+ listing.
EBC is open to sellers who have been approved as brand owners through Amazon’s Brand Registry process.

t11.message: If you hover your cursor over LQS value for a couple of seconds, you will see more details about the quality of listing.

t12.message: If you click on a Price value, you will see the graph with price changes in time.

t13.message: If you click on the Potential Score number you will see a full breakdown of the niche potential.

os_avgMargin_4_desc.message: You will easily profit. But don’t forget to add shipping, production and marketing to your costs in the Profit Calculator.

Thank you for your answer!
Enjoy your most effective Product Research with AMZScout.

questionnaire_q1.message: How many products do you sell on Amazon?

webinarSignup2.message: YES! Secure My Place For The Live Training

tooltip_1_beginner.message: You can always find the Niche breakdown report here.

tooltip_2_beginner.message: Filter out the products based on specific criteria and expectations from the figures. For example, price you want to sell for, monthly sales, revenue you plan to have, etc.

tooltip_3_beginner.message: Choose what columns you want visible for a customized menu just for your needs.

tooltip_4_beginner.message: Sort any column by clicking on its title. You can sort and see best rank, best sales, best price, and best revenue and find the perfect combination for you.

tooltip_5_beginner.message: The revenue calculator is here (click on the blue numbers). You can see all the profit and costs for a product you are considering. This includes the fees, as if you were already selling the product!

tooltip_6_beginner.message: Revenue to Reviews Ratio does wonders to help you find a product which makes great revenue with few reviews. Reviews are hard to get - that’s why this tool is important.

tooltip_7_beginner.message: This is Listing Quality Score with a detailed description of what is good and bad in the product page. Just hover your cursor over it. You will immediately see what you can do better or copy what is done.

tooltip_8_beginner.message: This is a Niche Suggestion or Finder, intended to give you ideas for niches you can start with. This will help you to expand your horizons about what can be sold on Amazon.

tooltip_9_beginner.message: Product Score shows if a product is a great idea to sell based on its sales, rank, rating, reviews and other indicators.

tooltip_10_beginner.message: This shows the keywords used across titles in this niche. The frequency is shown in brackets. Use the most popular words to create your own title, building on the work made of your competitors.

tooltip_1_expert.message: You can always find the Niche breakdown report here.

tooltip_2_expert.message: Set filters so that you can use predetermined criteria. This helps you pick products at the right sales price and right demand, based on your selling strategy.

tooltip_3_expert.message: Customize the menu for your needs by deciding which columns are visible.

tooltip_4_expert.message: You can sort columns by clicking the title. This helps you find the highest revenue product, newest products, etc. Looking at newer products can help you set expectations for sales on your first batches of inventory.

tooltip_5_expert.message: The revenue calculator helps you calculate your profit for an item. It includes fulfillment fees for FBA items, estimated storage fees, and selling fees. Input your costs to get a true profit estimate.

tooltip_6_expert.message: The Revenue to Reviews Ratio  shows the relationship between revenue and reviews. A higher ratio shows it is possible to make money even with a low amount of reviews.

tooltip_7_expert.message: The Listing Quality Score helps you see weaknesses in competitor listings based on lengths of descriptions and images. It is a good baseline, but closer inspection will still be needed to recognize more specific flaws.

tooltip_8_expert.message: This is the Niche Finder tool, which can give you some good ideas and niches to begin exploring, and to inspire new areas to delve into.

tooltip_9_expert.message: Product Score shows if a product is a great idea to sell based on its sales, rank, rating, reviews and other indicators.

tooltip_10_expert.message: This shows the keywords that products in this niche use in their titles. The bracketed number shows how many times it was used. When creating your title, be sure to include the most important keywords prominently in your own title.
